summary: This mod adds the enchantments from the gloves and hood from the Dark Brotherhood\'s Armor and place it on the Nightingale counterpart.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds the enchantments from the gloves and hood from the Dark Brotherhood\'s Armor and place it on the Nightingale counterpart.

I was mad about how awesome the Nightingale armor was but the enchantments were more adecuate for Nightblade classes than for Assassins so i took the liberty of editing the armor.

PS: Just like the original Nightingale set of weapons and armor scale depending on the level at the time of aquisition i took this in count for the Hood enchantments.

PPS: It\'s my first \"Mod\" please don\'t me mean ;)
author: McMuffinArg
